product_details.description: Note: The adapter is stored inside the air purifier; Power Adapter(Input): 100-240V 50/60 H Rated Power: 7W Noise Level: 25-44dB Dimension: 6.5 × 6.5 × 10.4 inch. 𝗥𝗘𝗠𝗢𝗩𝗘 𝗣𝗢𝗟𝗟𝗨𝗧𝗔𝗡𝗧𝗦 𝗘𝗩𝗘𝗥𝗬𝗪𝗛𝗘𝗥𝗘: Our Pre-Filter and Main Filter capture lint, hair, pet dander, fine airborne pollutants, and smoke particles, helping achieve a cleaner environment for you 𝗛𝗘𝗟𝗣 𝗠𝗔𝗞𝗘 𝗢𝗗𝗢𝗥𝗦 𝗢𝗗𝗢𝗥𝗟𝗘𝗦𝗦: The Activated Carbon Filter helps neutralize smoke, odors, and fumes. You’ll love the feeling of breathing deeply at home 𝗨𝗦𝗘 𝗜𝗧 𝗔𝗡𝗬𝗪𝗛𝗘𝗥𝗘: With the Levoit Core Mini-P air purifiers for home, focus on your activities in the bedroom, kitchen, or office. It offers an auto-off display for uninterrupted sleep and calming aromatherapy #𝟭 𝗔𝗜𝗥 𝗣𝗨𝗥𝗜𝗙𝗜𝗘𝗥 𝗕𝗥𝗔𝗡𝗗: Levoit has sold over 6.5 million products worldwide, is available in 35 countries and regions, and has been a pioneer in air purification technology for 6 years 𝗚𝗘𝗡𝗨𝗜𝗡𝗘 𝗟𝗘𝗩𝗢𝗜𝗧 𝗙𝗜𝗟𝗧𝗘𝗥𝗦: Only use genuine Levoit replacement parts to maintain the best performance (Search for Core Mini-RF). Off-brand filters are inconsistent, unreliable, and may damage the air purifier 𝗡𝗢𝗧𝗘: Our products are manufactured in both Vietnam and China, so you may receive a machine made in either Vietnam or China Color - White ** Brand - LEVOIT ** Product Dimensions - 6.5"D x 6.5"W x 10.4"H ** Floor Area - 337 Square Feet ** Specification Met - ETL Certified **

banner_details:
This banner features a modern, clean layout highlighting a home appliance product. The background is light with soft blue abstract shapes and wave patterns, enhancing a fresh, airy feel aligned with the subject matter. Central to the design is a product image ("product_image") positioned prominently. At the top, the heading ("heading") uses a bold, futuristic font style in a dark blue tone, while the subheading ("subheading") appears just below it in a light blue for contrast. The bottom section includes the feature description ("description"), the pricing highlight ("price") in bold, and a clear call-to-action button ("cta_button") with accompanying text ("cta") in white on a vibrant blue background.

**Color Palette:**
- Background: #F5F9FF
- Primary Text: #2C3E50
- Subheading & CTA Button: #46A6D8
- Accent Blue Elements: #D4E6FF, #E6F0FF, #B1D1FF
- CTA Text: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a sleek, modern air purifier with a minimalist color palette. The dominant color is a clean, matte white (#F8F8F8), which emphasizes purity and cleanliness. The top grille and control panel use a charcoal gray (#444444) that adds contrast and draws focus to the interface. Accents like the blue indicator lights (#3DAAF0) and subtle red warning icon (#E54848) add functionality while discreetly standing out. The overall color blending is smooth and harmonious, with sufficient contrast to highlight the product’s tech-forward features. For an advertisement banner, this palette promotes sophistication, hygiene, and cutting-edge technology.
